overview: Mr. Gooch has spent the last 19 years working for financial services companies, like Ernst and Young and Instinet, and New Media consulting firms like Usar Systems, Agency.com and Concrete Media Inc. Mr. Gooch routinely managed accounts and projects valued between 2.5MM and 10MM. For the last several years Mr. Gooch has been focused on developing new online businesses that merge traditional offline businesses with web based workflow. Mr. Gooch has been interviewed on CNN, MSNBC, WTTG, as well as, American Photo and Connected Photographer magazines.
